name: Survival Frenzy
detailed_description:
Survival frenzy is a survival action game set in an island where only one person can escape.

A minimum of five to a maximum of 20 players will be fighting in a mess.

Only one who gets on a helicopter can escape the island.

There are five guns. A key is required to get each gun.
Your firearm may get robbed and it will get robbed.

No gun?

Punch. Kick. Stab.

Grab ….
Billiard balls, detergent bottles, golf clubs, baseball bats, chairs, fire extinguishers, bear traps, pepper pots, travelling carriers and other things around you.

Be creative.

If all fails, hide in a secret place.

The goal is simple. SURVIVE.

Key features
Items
- Any item can be a weapon.
- Don’t just throw them. Use them wisely.

Guns
- Guns will appear one at a time.
- Hard to get one and easier to get it robbed.

Escape
- A ladder will be dropped from the helicopter
- Hold on to it tight and start climbing!

short_description: You are no hero in this game.  You are just an average Joe.  Looking for teamwork? Heroic feat? Not here!  Be mean. Be dirty. Do what you got to do to survive.  Struggle to live.  Get the key. Get the gun.  Stay alive and escape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Inter Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Inter Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
